name: Network | OAM | Exiting Slave Loopback Mode
description: Interface has exited the slave loopback mode
subject_template: Interface {{interface}} has exited the slave loopback mode
body_template: Interface {{interface}} has exited the slave loopback mode
probable_causes: The specified interface has entered or exited loopback mode because of protocol control or an external event, such as the interface link going down.
